title: Trump Makes Joe Biden’s Son a Top Campaign Target
text:
President Trump took aim at the son of former Vice President Joe Biden, ridiculing the 49-year-old as a loser, accusing him of profiting off his father’s name and turning him into a campaign prop during a rally in Minnesota on Thursday.

In his first campaign rally since the House formally began an impeachment probe of the president, Mr. Trump made it clear that Hunter Biden would be a top target as he unrolls his re-election bid. Mr. Trump said he wanted his campaign to print “Where’s Hunter?” T-shirts.

...
description: President Trump took aim at the son of former Vice President Joe Biden, ridiculing the 49-year-old as a loser, accusing him of profiting off his father’s name and turning him into a campaign prop during a rally in Minnesota.
